name: Dark Mansion (DooMi42, RunescapeGamingLord, Yahhas, RainbowFrogFIN, ValoMies)
name_original: Dark Mansion (DooMi42, RunescapeGamingLord, Yahhas, RainbowFrogFIN, ValoMies)
description:
Dark Mansion is a 2D Halloween themed game made for.
Finnish College Jam #3.

In this game you walk trough a dark scary mansion and find holes in the floorboard and go trough them to progress.

Controls:

Movement: WASD and Mouse

Shoot: Mouse left click

Reload:  R

Open shop: Q

Pick up item: E

Use item: SPACE
